title: Marine Heavy Gunner Vietnam
description:
VIETNAM 1967: You are a Heavy Gunner, a Marine trained to handle the biggest, meanest guns the US Army can build. After a crash landing in Ã¢â‚¬ËœhotÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ enemy territory, you and your platoon must track down a ruthless enemy leader and rescue your fallen comrades from a remote POW camp. Your mission will take you deep into the Vietnam jungle, across rivers, into tunnels and up heavily defended hills against overwhelming odds. Mount up soldier, your buddies are counting on you...

Features:

*Mount and fire a variety of devastating American and Vietcong heavy  weapons.
*Blast enemies on foot or from heavy mounted guns on choppers and  boats.
*Feels like a movie with a fully scripted cinematic story spanning  10 massive levels.
*Powered by the Unreal game engine for stunning visuals and effects. *Your platoon fights alongside you and provides ammo and medical  attention.

MINIMUM PC REQUIREMENTS:
Windows 98/ME/2000/XP
Pentium III 750MHz Processor
128MB RAM (256MB for 2000/XP)
800MB Hard Disk Space
16-bit SVGA Display
32MB DirectX compatible Video Card with MultiTexturing
16-bit DirectX compatible Sound Card
Keyboard & mouse

Installation:
*Mount the ISO file(I used DAEMON Tool)
*Install
*Play

Please have fun & seed!
